                                <li class="comment-main-list-item" data-exposure="0" data-smzdm-id="2877254575" data-comment-id="286018468" data-comment-info="{&quot;is_visible&quot;: 0, &quot;action_top&quot;: 0, &quot;is_top&quot;: 0}">

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <!-- highlight -->

                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down"></i> -->

                                        <div class="tips-down">
                                            <div class="content">
                                                取消点踩展示评论
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="arrow">
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 end -->

                                    </div>
                                    <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 end -->
                                    <!-- 回复 -->
                                    <div class="J_replay comment-main-list-item-content-info-replay">回复</div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 展示出的回复框 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">

                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>有的</span>
                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->
                                                                                                                            </div>
                            <!-- 用户信息 及点赞操作 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info">
                                <div class="content-info"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-info -->
                                    <span>2023-11-27</span>
                                                                            <span>·</span>
                                        <span>湖北</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 start -->
                                <div class="user-downed-fold">
                                    <i class="icon-info-mark-o"></i>该评论被折叠
                                </div>
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 end -->
                                <div class="content-operation"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-operation -->
                                
                                                                        <!-- 点赞 -->
                                    <div class="J_zan comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_286018468" data-item="3, 1, 286018468, 97845864, 286018468">
                                        <span></span>
                                        <i class="icon-thumb-up-o-thin"></i>
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-up"></i> -->
                                    </div>
                                    <!-- 点踩 --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 start --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class J_cai 删除class caiNum -->
                                    <div class="J_cai comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan ">
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i> -->
